thread.section_title: Beachcamera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beachcamera | www.beachcamera.com | 5 of 12
thread.title: James Hayes

author: James Hayes
title: James Hayes
text: I did extensive research before selecting a new camera to give to my wife as a gift. Likewise I considered several merchants. I chose Beach Camera because of prior experience with them and also because I found their prices and products to be competitive. In my case, they offered the best deal I could find for the camera package that I wanted. I am very happy with my purchase.
